item.title: About Me
item.description:
The Start

Hello, my name is Sameer, and this is the beginning of my new blog. I’m currently studying at Case Western Reserve University. I’m enthusiastic about tech and love learning new skills and this blog will be a space where I share my journey, projects, and the latest skills I’ve picked up.

Feel free to follow along, and if you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out to me via email.
